name: Comfy convenient  room in cool neighborhood
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is set in the historic and sought after Fort Hill neighborhood.  It has great restaurants and a supermarket just down the street.  The neighborhood also has great parks if you want some green space or just to take a walk.
description:
Comfy private room in a convenient basement level apartment with lots of charm and character. Loads of great art throughout the apartment will calm your senses and make you feel right at home. Forthill is a safe home base for exploring Boston, attending a conferences or checking out schools. Watch Hulu or Roku stream tv or just relax in your cozy room. Place from 4 blocks from Roxbury Crossing orange line metro. Centrally located the apartment is a 10-15 min Uber ride to anywhere in Boston.

Guest access
Entrance to the apartment is on the left side of the house. Guest will have access to their private room and to the entire apartment.

License number
STR-411741
